channel.title: The Garage on Adventures Unknown
channel.description: Recent content in The Garage on Adventures Unknown

item.title: Control4 the Garage Door
item.description: When we first moved into our house, the home builder installed a set of Chamberlain myQ enabled smart garage door openers. I was excited about the possibility of being able to use my phone to make sure that our doors were closed when we were away, or to be notified if they opened when they shouldn’t.

item.title: A Tactical Tire Kit
item.description: If you go off-road often, it’s not a matter of if, but when you’re going to need an air compressor, or some other source of compressed air. Whether it’s for airing your tires back up before returning to pavement, or refilling a repaired tire, having a compressor with you is vital.
